SEARCH
Package org.example.crmedu.application.mapping

Interface JwtDTOMapper

public interface JwtDTOMapper
A mapper interface for converting between Jwt domain model and its corresponding DTOs. Uses MapStruct for automatic mapping.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JwtResponse
    toJwtResponse(Jwt jwt)
    Converts a Jwt entity to a JwtResponse.

  • Method Details

    • toJwtResponse

      JwtResponse toJwtResponse(Jwt jwt)
      Converts a Jwt entity to a JwtResponse.
      Parameters:
      jwt - the jwt model to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding JwtResponse DTO
